title: Until Something
description: Six weeks in, Berkley’s transition to college had been smooth. She was just a regular Christian girl navigating the obstacles most girls faced in college. Her parents had always said that God had a plan for her and she never had a reason to doubt God's plan. Being the "good girl" is what she did best. It was easy… until she met The One. Then, everything became complicated, especially her faith
author: Scott Patrick
